00009 namespace VTD
00010 {
00011 // have to made since we have to define receiving point where we should get data
00012 typedef struct UDP_CONNECTION
00013 {
00014    ConnectionHandle handle;
00015    bool receiveBlock;
00016    bool sendBlock;
00017    boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::udp::socket> socket;
00018    boost::asio::ip::udp::endpoint endpoint;
00019 }UdpConnection_t;
00020 
00024 class UdpPort :  public ServicePort, public boost::noncopyable
00025 {
00026     public:
00027         // map of udp sockets
00028         typedef std::map<ConnectionHandle, UdpConnection_t> UdpSocketMap;
00032         UdpPort();
00033 
00037         virtual ~UdpPort();
00038 
00043         virtual void disconnect(ConnectionHandle& handle);
00044 
00054         virtual void connectToPort(const std::string& hostname, unsigned int portNumber, Protocols::Enum typeOfConnection, ConnectionHandle& handle, bool sendBlock = false, bool receiveBlock = false);
00055 
00061         virtual void OnReceiveRDB(const boost::system::error_code& ErrorCode, ConnectionHandle& handle);
00062 
00068         virtual bool isConnected(const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00069 
00074         void OnSendRDB(const boost::system::error_code& ErrorCode);
00075 
00082         template<typename T>
00083         void readDataUdp(T& buffer, const ConnectionHandle& handle, Callback& callback)
00084         {
00085            socketMap_.find(handle)->second.socket->async_receive(boost::asio::buffer(buffer, buffer.size()), callback);
00086         }
00087 
00095         virtual void writeScpData(const std::string& buffer, const ConnectionHandle& handle, const char* senderName = "VtdApi", const char* receiverName = "TaskControl");
00096 
00102         virtual void writeRDBData(const std::vector<char>& bufferRDB, const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00103 
00107         virtual void startReading();
00108 
00112         virtual void stopReading();
00113 
00118         virtual void setCallbackRDB(Callback cb);
00119 
00124         virtual void close(boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::ip::udp::socket>& socket);
00125 
00126  protected:
00127 
00128         // socket map
00129         UdpSocketMap socketMap_;
00130         // boost asio io service
00131         boost::shared_ptr<boost::asio::io_service> io_service_;
00132         // udp conection structure
00133         UdpConnection_t udpConnection_;
00134 
00135 private:
00144         bool connectToPortUdp(UdpConnection_t& udpConnection_t
00145                            , Protocols::Enum typeOfConnection
00146                            , bool sendBlock
00147                            , bool receiveBlock);
00148 
00153         void decodeRDBMessageUDP(const ConnectionHandle& handle);
00154 
00162         bool getEndPoint(UdpConnection_t& udpConnection_t, const std::string& hostname, const unsigned int& portNumber);
00163 
00168         void OnSendSCP(const boost::system::error_code& ErrorCode);
00169 
00170     private:
00171         // callback function
00172         Callback funcRDB_;
00173         // header buffer
00174         boost::shared_ptr<RDB_MSG_HDR_t> headerBuffer_;
00175         // connection mutex
00176         boost::mutex connectionLock_;
00177 };
00178         // udp port
00179         typedef boost::shared_ptr<UdpPort> UdpPort_ptr;
